Eric Schmidt 's very good at bringing people together, getting people to agree. In the interview, Mr. Page and Mr. Sergey Brin provided a few hints about their priorities when Mr. Page returns to the top. He sat out the first half so he http://wn.com/Allen_Iverson_1st_Win_as_a_Pistons_vs_Kings_30pts_9asts_7rebs_08/09_NBA For a veteran like Allen Iverson , a win in November against a lottery team rarely registers as important. After losing his first two games with his new team, that wasn't the case with this victory. Allen Iverson had 30 points, nine assists and provided a spark for Detroit after a slow start, winning his first game since joining the Pistons, 100-92 over the Sacramento Kings on Tuesday night. "It was a huge lift off of me, Allen Iverson said. "I knew it would happen. You think every game you go out and play it's going to happen. It feels good. I wanted to get the monkey off my back. I

He is a very private man, who often in meetings looks down at his hand-held Android device, who is not a comfortable public speaker, who hates to have a regimented schedule, who thinks it is an inefficient use of his time to invest too much of it in meetings with journalists or analysts or governments, Ken Auletta writes. appears to mesh with another by TechCrunch's Michael Arrington , who wrote that his blog was about to break the story about Eric Schmidt being tired and wanting out last summer.
